name: obsidian-better-properties
description: Upgrades Obsidian properties with new types, features, and more!

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.release: node getChangelogEntry.mjs && git tag -a %npm_config_tag% -m '%npm_config_tag%' && git push origin %npm_config_tag%

author: Unxok
